dict.acceptation: （反身代词）他自己；（用以加强语气）他亲自，他本人；

sent.orig: Yielding himself to his feelings of worthlessness, he tried to kill himself.
sent.trans: 他总是觉得自己一无是处，便企图自杀。

sent.orig: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted.
sent.trans: 因为凡自高的必降为卑。自卑的必升为高。

sent.orig: He acquitted himself very well ma every occasion, but he never pushed himself forward.
sent.trans: 他每个场合表现都很好；但从不突出自己。

sent.orig: He who trims himself to suit everyone will soon whittle himself away.
sent.trans: 试图改变自己适应别人的人很快就会迷失自己。

sent.orig: When he was pleased with himself, he permitted himself a pinch of snuff.
sent.trans: 得意的时候他只闻一点鼻烟。
